Text:
Thanks for this Merzedes, as always you deliver.

I haven't been much of a fan of the device bondage series at all, but people (and by people I mean my role model Princess Donna) seems to be just crazy about this Seda girl, so I'll give it another shot.

Remember, today is International Women's Day!
I'll print out a photo of Princess Donna and stick it to our door so my bf knows what he can expect when he gets back from work :)
Thanks Merzedes. About Seda: the whole Kink crew got to meet her at New Year' Eve party, and all of them (given voice by Princess Donna) thought "she's cute!".

Seda is cute but wow, Katie cums at the drop of a hat. A perfect girl for Device Bondage.

Thanks merzedes.
